title: pvp.net patcher not working
body: so i try to launch league and i get a pop up says pvp.net patcher kernal is not working. i cant even start the patcher :( or open the game

replies.body: This error usually indicates a security setting with your OS that's blocking the patcher from opening.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
